Articles.Content: I haven't played Kerbal for a year or two but i remember there was a "Dark-multiplayer" that worked somewhat back in the days. Is there any multiplayer activity going on with the current patches or servers or whatnot?
Yes, I used it a few months ago but quit...... And I put up a forum asking how to host one but it got no replies. But as far as I know, DMP is still up and running!
